#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
    int m,n;
    scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
    if (m==0||n==0)printf("0\n");
    else if(m==n){
             if(m%2==0)printf("%d\n",m+1);
             else printf("%d\n",m);
             }
    else if(m!=n){
         if(m%2==0||n%2==0)printf("%d\n",(m+n)/2+1);
         else printf("%d\n",(m+n)/2);
         }
    }
    return 0;
}
